javadoc: Task for recursively deleting project files from a Ghidra project

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new DeleteProjectFilesTask with the list of folders and files to delete.

params.name: folders
params.comment:
the fist of DomainFolders (and all files contained recursively 
 in those folders) to delete

params.name: files
params.comment: the list of DomainFiles to delete

params.name: fileCount
params.comment: the number of files being deleted

params.name: parent
params.comment: the component to use for parenting any dialogs that are shown

name: DeleteProjectFilesTask
comment: Task for recursively deleting project files from a Ghidra project
